DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether multi-dimensional wellness program ( diet , art biofield therapy ) influence quality life different health status Japan .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Multi-dimensional Wellness Program Quality Life
DOC.detailed_description: Combination wellness program may one best approach improve quality life ; however , effectiveness treatment combine various program also yet clarify . This study investigate influence Okada Health Wellness program quality life healthy people illness Japan . Okada Health Wellness program consist 3 component : diet , art biofield therapy .
DOC.criteria: Those interested practicing diet program art therapy establish MOA International Corporation . Able receive Okada Purifying Therapy , domain biofield therapy least week . Competent answer Japanese questionnaire quality life Aged 16 year old Those match inclusion criterion
